billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

title: Relates to exempting new and used ambulances purchased by an ambulance service from state sales and compensating use taxes
summary: Exempts new and used ambulances purchased by an ambulance service from state sales and compensating use taxes.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exemption of new and used ambulance vehicles and equipment from state sales and compensating use taxes
